segments.text: What seems to be the trouble , Mr . Brown ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm in pretty bad shape , Dr . Ford .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No appetite , always on edge , and I can't sleep well .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I have lost quite a few pounds since last month .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: When was the last time you had a check-up ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let me take your blood pressure . You look anemic .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , Mr . Brown , I'm happy to say it's nothing serious .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You're just a little run-down from overwork .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What am I supposed to do ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think all you need is just a vacation .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Try to get outdoors more and be sure to get more rest .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you , doctor . I'll do as you say .
segments.speaker: S1
